list-item.p: Universities should incorporate climate change topics into the curriculum not only in the science and agriculture modules but also in all faculties. This will enable students from across the university spectrum to grasp the basic knowledge of climate change issues so as to educate their communities on a wide range of these issues.

There should be programmes to prioritise climate change knowledge, awareness and mitigation where students are encouraged to take an active role. These programmes should include awareness workshops where experts in the field are regularly invited to address students.
